title: 156: CAREER, RECOVERY AND CHAOS WITH SAM TRIPOLI
description: This week my good friend and hilarious comic Sam Tripoli joins. We get deep on life, the state of culture, conspiracy theories and recovery. Sam talks about career and how he's evolved as a person. It's such a great conversation I know you will love him. Check him out on http://www.samtripoli.com.
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
